Detailed Description

The base class of all functional robotic classes.

The class FunctionalObject is the base class of all functional robotic classes (e.g. Trajectory Generator, Servo Control). It defines a generic interface that is common to all of the functional robotic classes. This allows to perform an operation on all functional objects.

Currently the class is unused. It is only added as the symmetric counterpart to PhysicalObject.

Member Data Documentation

TypeInfoAbstractT< FunctionalObject > s_typeInfo [static]
 

The static type info object of the class. Every class derived from RoboticObject must have this static data member and initialize it correctly.
